TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program - An Indie "Must Play" Now on Sale for 40% off at Green Man Gam

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/18hJnSr"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/a621db300fd4bb7d006e6d7789ea20c7/tumblr_inline_naisvjOAyo1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>Green Man Gaming has named <em>Kerbal Space Program</em> as one of the top 5 indie games you must play! To celebrate, they’ve put <em>KSP</em> on <a href="http://bit.ly/18hJnSr"><strong>SALE</strong></a> for 40% off the regular price. If you’ve been waiting for a good time to take a trip to the Mun, this is it.</p>
